errors.missingName: Please give a name to the submission.
errors.missingDescription: Please give a description to the submission.

error.default: Unfortunately an unexpected error happened on our servers. {{helperText}}
error.504: Unfortunately we couldn't connect to our server.

info.default: For some reason, your file is still being saved to our database, please wait. If saving doesn't go through in two minutes, please try saving the file again.

doi.saved: DOI form has been saved successfully

submissions.deleted: The submission has been deleted successfully!

submitted.title: Would you like to save the edited form data?
submitted.content: Unsaved changes will be lost. If you save the form as a draft, you can continue filling it later.

form.title: Would you like to save a draft version of this form?
form.content: If you save this form as a draft, you can continue filling it later.

xml.title: Would you like to save a draft version of this xml upload?
xml.content: If you save the xml as a draft, you can upload it later.

existing.title: Would you like to save a draft version of this existing object upload?
existing.content: If you save the object as a draft, you can upload it later.

cancel.title: Cancel creating a submission?
cancel.content: If you cancel creating a submission, the submission and its content will not be saved anywhere.

save.title: Save progress and exit?
save.content: Submission progress will be saved, and you will return to the homepage.

content.objects: Objects in this submission will be published.
content.chooseDrafts: Please choose the drafts you would like to save, unsaved drafts will be removed from this submission.

page400.errorText: Something was wrong with the request. This can be for example due to missing password and/or username.

page401.errorText: You are seeing this page because your login information was incorrect, your session expired or you haven’t logged in yet.

page403.errorText: You are seeing this page because you were trying to perform an action that you are not allowed to.

page404.errorText: The page {{path}} you were looking for was not found.

page500.errorText: You are seeing this page because the service is currently unavailable. Please check back later.
page500.errorText2: You can find more information about service breaks

footer.sdSubmit: SD Submit – Services for Sensitive Data
footer.csc: CSC - IT Center for Science Ltd.
